A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wife and I just got done seeing this movie\, and we loved it. I dont know what most fans hated about it. Fin was great and his character is starting to get alot better. Rey's story is starting to unfold nicely...if a tad bit slow. If  you follow the books you know who Rey is. I think they could have done a better job bringing everything together better but for the most part we really enjoyed it.
